results.overview: Bill Lawrence wins a bevy of prizes from a radio program, but ends up having to sell them in order to pay the taxes incurred.
results.title: The Jackpot

results.overview: When a group of tourists stumble into the remote Australian river territory of an enormous crocodile, the deadly creature traps them on a tiny mud island with the tide quickly rising and darkness descending. As the hungry predator closes in, they must fight for survival against all odds.
results.title: Rogue

results.overview: Although shot simultaneously with the first part, director Vít Olmer's sequel to the story of three businesswomen dealing in erotic services stands on its own. The film abandons a majority of the topics important to the original and focuses instead on a new plot and characters: the erotic club's new owner introduces an element of crime by blackmailing her customers.
results.title: Playgirls 2

results.overview: In Italy, three men fall in love with three women. First a young engaged lawyer has a fling, then the middle-aged married man has a fling, then a retired man falls in love with his friend's daughter.
results.title: Ages of Love

results.overview: A young girl's aunt tells her the tale of a young ice skater and an enchanted reindeer.
results.title: Blizzard

results.overview: Simon Bolivar is the true-life story of the leader of the 1817 Venezuelan revolution.
results.title: Simon Bolivar

results.overview: Notorious hacker Drew Reynolds is captured by the CIA and given a proposition - work for them or spend the rest of his life in prison. Agreeing on the condition that he can form his own team, he puts together a group of "throwaways" - the people deemed expendable and seemingly the worst in the organization.
results.title: The Throwaways

results.overview: In early 19th century England, ambitious and ruthless orphan Rebecca Sharp advances from the position of governess to the heights of British society. The first feature length film to use three-strip Technicolor.
results.title: Becky Sharp

results.overview: After a near-fatal car accident, Sam wakes to discover he is trapped in an abandoned hospital by mysterious and sinister forces that have no intention of letting him leave…
results.title: Disquiet

results.overview: Kath & Kim turn more than just heads when they go on an overseas trip and end up being the centre of their very own fairytale.
results.title: Kath & Kimderella

results.overview: The kingdom is in a festive mood as everyone gathers for the royal wedding of Rapunzel and Flynn. However, when Pascal and Maximus, as flower chameleon and ring bearer, respectively, lose the gold bands, a frenzied search and recovery mission gets underway. As the desperate duo tries to find the rings before anyone discovers that they’re missing, they leave behind a trail of comical chaos that includes flying lanterns, a flock of doves, a wine barrel barricade and a very sticky finale. Will Maximus and Pascal save the day and make it to the church in time? And will they ever get Flynn’s nose right?
results.title: Tangled Ever After

results.overview: Sandy, a geologist, finds herself stuck on a field trip to the Pilbara desert with a Japanese man she finds inscrutable, annoying and decidedly arrogant. Hiromitsu's view of her is not much better. Things go from bad to worse when they become stranded in one of the most remote regions on Earth.
results.title: Japanese Story

results.overview: Dominic’s fetish is… himself. Nothing turns him on more than his own reflection. That’s why discovering that he has a twin brother, raised in a remote monastery by a depraved priest, causes him major consternation. Fate brings the two young men back together again, and their fraternal relationship is torn between sex, revenge and redemption.
results.title: Saint-Narcisse

results.original_title: Crime in Connecticut: The Story of Alex Kelly
results.overview: About a notorious Connecticut convicted rapist.
results.title: Crime in Connecticut: The Story of Alex Kelly

results.overview: A clerical error leads to the appointment of a left-leaning small-town priest to a rich village, where he immediately horrifies his snobby parishioners by appointing a dustman and a black man as vicar's wardens and throwing open the vicarage to the sprawling, disreputable Smith family, who have just been evicted from their caravan site. He converts the dowager aristocrat to works of absurd charity but he soon has the town and much of the country in uproar.
results.title: Heavens Above!

results.overview: A young serial killer preys on families during lightning storms.
results.title: Basement Jack

results.overview: A young psychiatric nurse goes to work at a lonesome asylum following a murder. There, she experiences varying degrees of torment from the patients.
results.title: Don't Look in the Basement

results.overview: Based on a short story by Johannes Linnankoski. A  story of a milkmaid that falls in love with a student on holiday
results.title: The Milkmaid

results.overview: During a trip to Denmark, a man is arrested and accused of murdering his wife and three children. Though maintaining his innocence, he remains jailed as police investigate.
results.title: Plastic Guns

results.overview: A multi-dimensional interface between a comic book artist, a novelist, and a film director. Each lives in a separate reality but authors a story about one of the others.
results.title: Zoom
